name: Simplify Google
description:
Make Google Search results much less cluttered.
This is my first ever userstyle, and as I made it in much of a hurry, please excuse my CSS. 
Any corrections or suggestions are very welcome.

This userstyle only works on normal Javascript Google, and is only tested in Safari so far.
additional_info:
v1.1: Fixes some types of search.
v1.1.2: Bug fixes.
v1.1.3: Fixes image saturation.
